content: Egypt and Her Allies Will Fall
The word of the  came to me again, saying,
“Son of man, prophesy and say, ‘Thus says the Lord :
“Ethiopia, Libya, Lydia, all the mingled people, Chub, and the men of the lands who are allied, shall fall with them by the sword.”
And it came to pass in the eleventh year, in the first  on the seventh  of the month,  the word of the  came to me, saying,
“Son of man, I have broken the arm of Pharaoh king of Egypt; and see, it has not been bandaged for healing, nor a splint put on to bind it, to make it strong enough to hold a sword.
Therefore thus says the Lord : ‘Surely I  against Pharaoh king of Egypt, and will break his arms, both the strong one and the one that was broken; and I will make the sword fall out of his hand.
I will scatter the Egyptians among the nations, and disperse them throughout the countries.
I will strengthen the arms of the king of Babylon and put My sword in his hand; but I will break Pharaoh’s arms, and he will groan before him with the groanings of a mortally wounded

Thus I will strengthen the arms of the king of Babylon, but the arms of Pharaoh shall fall down; they shall know that I  the , when I put My sword into the hand of the king of Babylon and he stretches it out against the land of Egypt.
I will scatter the Egyptians among the nations and disperse them throughout the countries. Then they shall know that I  the .’ ”
